name: BloodMoney
description:
Introduction

Welcome to my first ever created game: BloodMoney!

Try to reach as high as you can, but beware: In order to step through the magic door, you need to sacrifice some of your health. Suck the blood from fallen enemies to get your life total back up. Every five levels you'll get the option to pay more of your blood for some upgrade to health, recovery or damage, so make sure you have some to spare. Defeated the room and need more blood? Interact with the altar to reset the room.

Controls

A, D to move left and right, W or Space to jump and E to interact with items/enemies
